oops_problem_ocurred: Oops, a problem has occurred. Please try again.
Bad Request: The request could not be processed due to a client error.
Unauthorized: Invalid credentials. Please verify your login information.
Forbidden: You do not have permission to access this resource.
Not Found: The requested resource was not found.
Internal Server Error: An unexpected error occurred on the server.
Bad Gateway: The server received an invalid response from another server.
Service Unavailable: The service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
Gateway Timeout: The server did not respond in a timely manner. Please try again.
